item.ducksgalore.emerald_rubber_duck.too: Grants Hero of the Village when used
tooltip.ducksgalore.gold_ore_rubber_duck: Grants Luck when used - A rare find from mining gold ore!
gold_ore_rubber_duck_block_event: Gold Ore Rubber Duck Block Interaction
gold_ore_rubber_duck_block_event.sub: Gold Ore Rubber Duck Block Interaction
ponder.ducksgalore.rubber_duck.title: Rubber Duck
ponder.ducksgalore.rubber_duck.desc1: The Rubber Duck is a friendly companion that floats on water and provides Absorption when used.
ponder.ducksgalore.rubber_duck.desc2: Craft a Rubber Duck using 4 Clay Balls and 1 Yellow Dye. The recipe is shapeless, so arrangement doesn't matter.
ponder.ducksgalore.rubber_duck.desc3: When right-clicked, the duck quacks and grants you Absorption I for 30 seconds. This effect replaces existing Absorption effects.
ponder.ducksgalore.golden_ritual.title: Golden Rubber Duck
ponder.ducksgalore.golden_ritual.desc1: The Golden Rubber Duck is a powerful upgrade to the regular Rubber Duck, providing enhanced Absorption effects.
ponder.ducksgalore.golden_ritual.desc2: Build an altar using 9 Gold Blocks arranged in a 3x3 square. The center block will be where you place the ingredients.
ponder.ducksgalore.golden_ritual.desc3: Place a regular Rubber Duck and an Enchanted Golden Apple on the center gold block. Both items must be placed at the same time.
ponder.ducksgalore.golden_ritual.desc4: Strike the center of the altar with lightning to activate the ritual. This will transform your items into a Golden Rubber Duck!
ponder.ducksgalore.gold_ore_duck.title: Gold Ore Rubber Duck
ponder.ducksgalore.gold_ore_duck.desc1: The Gold Ore Rubber Duck is a rare treasure that brings good fortune to miners. It can only be found by mining gold ore.
ponder.ducksgalore.gold_ore_duck.desc2: This special duck has a 0.05% chance to drop when mining regular Gold Ore, and a 0.1% chance when mining Deepslate Gold Ore.
ponder.ducksgalore.gold_ore_duck.desc3: When right-clicked, the duck quacks and grants you Luck for 30 seconds, increasing your chances of finding treasure!
